work-item.field:
For our question item we need some extra fields which should be created during this exercise. We need an answer field, an enumeration to select the topic this question is about and we also want to use our custom priority to define how urgent a question is. In addition, the selected priority should depend on the topic we choose.
  • Before we create our custom fields we should create our enumeration values which can be selected by these custom fields.
    Open Administration>Work Items>Enumerations to create the enumerations
    • Select question as workitem type and add following enumeration values

      • topicenum (enumeration values: process, configuration, trainingMaterials, polarion, other)
      • prioenum (enumeration values: urgent, notUrgent, average)
  • Open Administration>Work Items>Custom Fields to define the custom fields
    • Create a new custom field for questions
    • Add following custom fields
      • answer: (type:rich text)
      • topic: (enumeration value: topicenum)
      • customPriority: (enumeration value: prioenum)
      • customPriority should depend on a selected topic
        • Click  to add a dependency
        • Select Topic as field and add a mapping
          • Questions regarding Training Materials should not be Urgent. All other topics should select all custom Priorities.
    • Verify if you create a new question and select Training Materials as topic you can only select Average or Not Urgent
